summoned with #428 Contact Nagaraja (Conjuration 5)

Nagarajas, Naga Kings, are the rulers of the Jeweled City of Patala. They are skilled generals and powerful mages and priests. They often take the shape of a Gandharva when leading mundane armies. If killed in Gandharva shape, they revert to their serpent form and fight on. Nagarajas in Naga shape have their skill in Water magic increased.
